title: Wave properties - pulses 1 and 2 on same string

content.question: The figure shows two wave pulses, <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, traveling to the right along the same string. Wave Pulse <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> has a greater amplitude than Wave Pulse <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>. Which of the following claims about the two wave pulses is true?

choices.label: The direction of the disturbance is parallel to the direction of propagation of the wave for both wave pulses.
Wave Pulse <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> carries more energy than Wave Pulse <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>.

Wave Pulse <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> transfers more matter along the string than Wave Pulse <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>.

The speed at which Wave Pulse <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> propagates along the string is greater than the speed at which Wave Pulse <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> propagates along the string.

content.answer: Wave Pulse <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> carries more energy than Wave Pulse <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>.

topic.text: 14.1: Properties of Wave Pulses and Waves

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
